scripts.devcontainer:setup: cross-env DOCKER-MODE=y bash -c ". ../graphile-starter-project/.env && yarn docker-reset && yarn docker-run-setup"
scripts.devcontainer:up: cross-env DOCKER-MODE=y bash -c ". ../graphile-starter-project/.env && yarn docker-reset && yarn docker-up -d"
scripts.docker-attach-dev: docker-compose --project-name graphile-starter_devcontainer exec dev bash -c "yarn dev"
scripts.docker-run-setup: yarn docker-build-once && docker-compose --project-name graphile-starter_devcontainer -f docker-compose.yml exec dev bash -c "yarn setup"
